column2: OTE: The variables in this section are recoded variables that were created from one or more of the edited variables from the preceding section.
OTE: Certain source variables that were used to create recoded variables have valid values that might not have been reported or assigned for the
current survey year. However, these values have been included in the general specifications in the codebook on how the recoded variables were
created. See additional details about this issue in the Organization of the Data File section of this codebook introduction.
he following variable defines the social context of a respondent's last alcohol use, including whether they drank alone or if they were with one or
Len : 1    RC-SOCIAL CONTEXT OF MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE
<s>OTE: The following eight variables define the locations where respondents had their most recent alcohol use.</s>
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE IN A CAR
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE AT HOME
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE AT SOMEONE ELSE'S HOME
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE AT A PARK, BEACH, OR LOT
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE AT RESTAURANT, BAR, OR CLUB
Len : 1    RC-MOST RECENT ALCOHOL USE AT CONCERT OR SPORTS GAME
